scripts.compile: rm -rf build && tsc && (browserify build/frontend/scripts/eduk8s.js --standalone eduk8s -o build/frontend/scripts/eduk8s-bundle.js) && (cat build/frontend/scripts/eduk8s-bundle.js | uglifyjs > build/frontend/scripts/eduk8s-bundle.min.js) && (browserify build/frontend/scripts/testing/dashboard.js --standalone dashboard -o build/frontend/scripts/testing/dashboard-bundle.js) && (cat build/frontend/scripts/testing/dashboard-bundle.js | uglifyjs > build/frontend/scripts/testing/dashboard-bundle.min.js)
